name: Lunch Break (AshumBesher)
description:
In this retro arcade style game, you must make sure that Chris enjoys his lunch break for as long as possible. Rats, birds, ball players, boomerang throwers, and much more are all out to ruin Chris's picnic. Chris must dodge, duck, swat, and kick his way though each level in order to protect his lunch.

In bonus rounds, shovel food in Chris's mouth as fast as possible, but watch out for the pigeon...

If Chris's enjoyment reaches zero, his lunch break is ruined and the game is over!

Try to make it to the top of the leaderboard!

Follow my Instagram page for my game dev updates: https://www.instagram.com/ashumarcade
